title: Virtual Event: Hello, Luminary. Featuring Jo Ractliffe
short_description: Say hello to Luminary with a conversation between South African photographer Jo Ractliffe and Matthew Witkovsky, the Richard and Ellen Sandor Chair and Curator of Photography and Media and Vice President for Strategic Art Initiatives. Not only will you get a preview of the upcoming exhibition Jo Ractliffe: DRIVES, but you’ll also get a deeper look at the full arc of Ractliffe’s career, which began in the early 1980s amid rising anti-apartheid protest, political tension, and uncertainty. Ractliffe will be joining the conversation from her studio in Johannesburg.
list_description: Say hello to Luminary with a conversation between South African photographer Jo Ractliffe and curator Matthew Witkovsky.
description:
Say hello to Luminary with a conversation between South African photographer Jo Ractliffe and Matthew Witkovsky, Richard and Ellen Sandor Chair and Curator of Photography and Media and Vice President for Strategic Art Initiatives. Not only will you get a preview of the upcoming exhibition Jo Ractliffe: DRIVES, but you’ll also get a deeper look at the full arc of Ractliffe’s career, which began in the early 1980s amid rising anti-apartheid protest, political tension, and uncertainty. Ractliffe will be joining the conversation from her studio in Johannesburg.

This event is exclusive to Luminary members. To register, email luminary@artic.edu.

Contact Us

Questions? Please reach out to us at luminary@artic.edu.

For questions related to accessibility accommodations, please email access@artic.edu.
